name: Treasure Of The Giantess
description:
The Story

Hayuna is a beautiful and brave woman who had recently heard of stories of a Giantess who lives in a castle at the top of the mountains to the north of her village. She heard that a great treasure is hidden away somewhere in that castle, but no one had ever been able to leave that castle alive with the treasure, they all died in that castle!

The brave Hayuna made up her mind and set off on her journey with determination to get that treasure!

The Gameplay

Third-person adventure, dark atmospheric puzzle game

Features:
-Explore beautifully designed interactive dungeons
-A beautiful female protagonist that is professionally voice-acted by a female actress
-Multiple endings based on your choices
-An easy-to-pick-up game that rewards your smart thinking
-A cryptic story presented within a very immersive dark atmospheric game
-A single player third-person adventure game with platforming and puzzles
-Sexy 3D female characters
